newsitem.title: USA: Hydro-Quebec to restore NY export power line Wed.
newsitem.headline: Hydro-Quebec to restore NY export power line Wed.

text.p: Hydro-Quebec said Tuesday it expected to restore an export power line to New York Wednesday following repairs to a transformer.
"It should be fixed this evening. It should be back to normal tomorrow," a company spokeswoman said.
The brief shutdown of the line halved the usual amount of power it sent to the New York Power Authority today to 400 megawatts (MW) from a more typical 800 MW, she said.
The Canadian utility began Monday the planned outage of the high-voltage line, one of the two interties to New York.
"It started yesterday. We had people working around the clock," she said.
